scripts.deploy:neon: graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ moraswap/maker maker.neon.yaml
scripts.deploy:devnet: graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ moraswap/maker-devnet maker.devnet.yaml
scripts.deploy-local: graph deploy --node http://localhost:8020/ --ipfs http://localhost:5001 --access-token moraswap/maker maker.devnet.yaml
